content:
The total fighting loss of the enemy from 24.02.22 to 13.03.24 is approximately:

  • personnel - -426870 (+980) persons liquidated
  • tanks -6752 (+5)
  • combat armored vehicles -12921 (+20)
  • Artillery systems -10554 (+32)
  • RSZV -1017 (+1)
  • air defense means -715 (+2)
  • aircraft -347 (0)
  • Helicopters -325 (0)
  • UAV of the operative-tactical level-8205 (+22)
  • Winged rockets -1919 (+1)
  • ships / boats -26 (0)
  • submarines -1 (0)
  • Automobile equipment and tanks -13932 (+62)
  • Special technique -1699 (+8)

Data are clarified ...

Beat the occupier! Let's win together! Our strength is in truth!

Source:The General Staff of the Armed Forces of UkraineAs of 13.03.24.
title: Enemy loss: nearly 1,000 invaders were eliminated per day, 32 artisystems and 20 BBM were destroyed
author: Army Inform
